ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_rainbow] Digest Number 206
ygData.msgSnippet: All I can say is WOW! Many many thanks to you all for making me feel so very welcome! Rodcent sounds like it does have the most glbt people (or alt least the
ygData.messageBody:
All I can say is WOW! Many many thanks to you all for making me feel so very
welcome! Rodcent sounds like it does have the most glbt people (or alt least
the most vocal - LOL), but I gotta admit, I'm a big ol' bear fan, so I think
I'll be bear hunting on Lanys T'Vyl first - I'm SO tempted to put a char on
each server name I got from you all just to meet everyone! Where to
begin....?

As for all you folk on my server (tholxe paells) who asked me to look them
up, you can bet on it!

Again, words fail me - Thanks to all of y'all!

Sam.


>From: "October" <october31@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_rainbow@yahoogroups.com
>To: <EQ_rainbow@yahoogroups.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ_rainbow] Digest Number 206
>Date: Tue, 30 Jan 2001 19:21:51 -0600
>
>Welcome!
>
>Yup, Ordo Ursi Prismatus is the bears guild on Lanys T'Vyl - not sure of
>shear numbers, but we have about 16 or so active members. We even have some
>characters on the other servers - I have a lowly druid on Nameless, just to
>hang out with the nice bunch of folks there.
>
>If you come by to check us out, my partner Chris is usually on quite a bit
>(Cadip, Taleen, Mathir), or you can just do a /who all ordo to bring up a
>list. Whichever guild you choose, I just hope you have as much fun as the
>rest of the Family!
>
>Hugs,
>
>Jack
>Hraska Bloodaxe - Shaman
>Habrell Oakencrown - Druid
>Hammond - Wizard
>Jkradkliff - Cleric of the Porn Squad
>
>october31@...
>-----------------------------------------------
>"I'd follow you through time 'til it's not worth living." Catherine Wheel
>
>
